input.sentences: there was once an alien race that came from a far distant galaxy .
it took them a couple of light years to finally reach earth .
during their journey they would get into galaxy battles with other alien races .
when they were finally really close to earth they had already lost more than half of their race .
after millions of years they finally were able to touch down on earth . they live among us and want to keep it that way .
output.sentences: The stars appear to race in a galaxy so distant you can barely comprehend it.
How long it takes light to reach a point is something we finally understand.
It races on a journey across the galaxy.
Some seem to race so fat they get lost halfway over.
It can touch the heart, and millions live never fully understanding.
